data.name: Flying Ruckus - Multiplayer
data.detailed_description:
Tight turns around city blocks and spinning around in the sky, Flying Ruckus - Multiplayer enables that and more, all in fast multiplayer action!

What To Expect:

.Multiplayer Action
.Online PVP
.CO - OP Game Mode(s)
.Highly Customizable Play Style
.Great Frame Rate Regardless Of Computer
.Offline PvE
(it Made Granny Proud)



Multiple Modes
.FFA
.TDM
.Doge Dight
.Practise

Doge Fight Example:




b]highly customizable Options[/b]
Examples:

(Change And Customize Your Weapons To Better Fit Your Personal play Style)

(equip Drip From An Large Array Of Paints)



Note*: Flying Ruckus Is Built On The Highly Optimized URP And Burst Compiler.

data.short_description: Flying Ruckus encourages quick action and aggression. You can super cruise or warp around the corners of cities, and the thrill of aerial combat is now available here for free!(No ads or microtransactions)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1035G4 CPU @ 1.10GHz 1.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) iris(R) plus graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Developed And Ran It On A HP Laptop 14 With Respectable Frame Rate
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 64
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GIGABYTE AMD Radeon RX 6600 EAGLE 8G
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HyperX Amp USB
  • Additional Notes: Don't Worry About Your Computer's Power, This Game Runs Well On Almost All Computers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: You Can Very Likely Run On Lower Specifications.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: M1 Ultra
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: It Can Definitely Run On Your Mac Even If It Has Below To Minimum Required Hardware I Have Listed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Very Basic Tech You Need To Run On Linux
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Mint 20.3
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1035G4 CPU @ 1.10GHz 1.50 GHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: If It Launches On Your Linux Computer, It Can Run Well On It.

data.legal_notice: I hope that I don't get in trouble . I do not commit crimes, I do not like to commit crimes.

subs.option_text: Flying Ruckus - Multiplayer - Commercial License (Free) - Free
